Author: peachbloompudding
Text: I feel you, my brain is awful to me. If I heard anyone talk to another person the way I talk to myself, I would be heartbroken, but I'm just used to subjecting myself to self hate that it is just "normal" now.   I hope you can relax soon, it can be hard to function when the voices are particularly loud.   Recently I've been having baths with bath bombs that make the water opaque and coloured so I can't see my own body and the water makes me all floaty, I just lay in the tub for ages watching netflix it's been making the last week more bearable for me. Maybe there is something you can do that would suit you that can help distract your mind for a little bit?
